name: The Factory (itch) (meadjix, Solmir2000, yinshi, Francois.ob, ilanouh)
name_original: The Factory (itch) (meadjix, Solmir2000, yinshi, Francois.ob, ilanouh)
description:
wasd/zqsd/arrows - to move

"E" to interact

The Factory is a game about Bob the factory man trying to produce enough soup cans to live another day.
